title: Cottage Cheese Casserole
description: A delicious and healthy casserole made with cottage cheese and other simple ingredients.

steps.description: Preheat oven to 350°F.
In a large bowl, mix together cottage cheese, eggs, flour, sugar, melted butter, vanilla extract, salt, and baking powder until well combined.
Pour mixture into a greased 9x13 inch baking dish.
Bake for 40-45 minutes, or until golden brown and set.
Let cool for a few minutes before serving.

title: Beef Stroganoff
description: A classic Russian dish made with sautéed beef, onions, mushrooms, and a sour cream sauce.

steps.description: In a large skillet, heat butter over medium-high heat. Add beef and cook until browned on all sides, about 5-7 minutes. Remove from heat and set aside.
Add onion and mushrooms to the skillet and cook until softened, about 5-7 minutes. Add garlic and cook for an additional 1-2 minutes.
Sprinkle flour over the vegetables and stir to combine. Cook for 1-2 minutes, stirring constantly.
Slowly add beef broth to the skillet, whisking constantly to prevent lumps from forming. Bring to a simmer and cook until the sauce thickens, about 5-7 minutes.
Remove the skillet from heat and stir in sour cream, salt, and black pepper.
Add the cooked beef to the skillet and stir to combine.
Serve the beef stroganoff over cooked egg noodles.

title: Chicken Alfredo
description: A creamy pasta dish made with chicken, fettuccine, and a Parmesan cream sauce.

steps.description: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add fettuccine and cook until al dente, about 8-10 minutes.
While the fettuccine is cooking, heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add chicken and cook until browned and cooked through, about 8-10 minutes. Remove from heat and set aside.
In a medium saucepan, melt butter over medium heat. Add garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
Add heavy cream, Parmesan cheese, salt, and black pepper to the saucepan and bring to a simmer, stirring frequently.
Cook the sauce until it thickens, about 5-7 minutes.
Once the fettuccine is cooked, reserve 1 cup of pasta water, then drain the pasta and return it to the pot.
Pour the sauce over the fettuccine and toss to coat the pasta, adding reserved pasta water as needed to create a creamy sauce.
Add the cooked chicken to the pasta and toss to combine.
Serve hot, garnished with additional Parmesan cheese and black pepper, if desired.

title: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: A classic Italian pasta dish made with spaghetti, eggs, pancetta or bacon, and Parmesan cheese.

steps.description: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add spaghetti and cook until al dente, about 8-10 minutes.
While the spaghetti is cooking, heat a large skillet over medium heat. Add pancetta or bacon and cook until crispy, about 8-10 minutes. Remove from heat and set aside.
In a medium bowl, whisk together eggs, Parmesan cheese, salt, and black pepper.
Once the spaghetti is cooked, reserve 1 cup of pasta water, then drain the spaghetti and return it to the pot.
Immediately pour the egg mixture over the spaghetti and toss to coat the pasta, adding reserved pasta water as needed to create a creamy sauce.
Immediately pour the egg mixture over the spaghetti and toss to coat the pasta, adding reserved pasta water as needed to create a creamy sauce.
Serve hot, garnished with additional Parmesan cheese and black pepper, if desired.

title: Chicken Fajitas
description: These chicken fajitas are a quick and easy meal that's perfect for weeknights. Juicy chicken, colorful peppers, and onions are seasoned with a blend of spices and served with warm tortillas.

steps.description: In a small bowl, combine chili powder, cumin, garlic powder, onion powder, paprika, salt, and black pepper.
In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium-high heat. Add chicken and cook for 5-7 minutes or until cooked through.
Add bell peppers, onion, and spice mixture to the skillet. Cook for an additional 5-7 minutes or until vegetables are tender.
Serve chicken and vegetables with warm tortillas and optional toppings, if desired.

title: Classic Lasagna
description: This classic lasagna recipe is a family favorite that never gets old. Layers of pasta, meat sauce, and cheese make for a delicious and comforting meal.

steps.description: In a large skillet, cook beef, onion, and garlic over medium heat until meat is no longer pink; drain.
Stir in crushed tomatoes, tomato paste, parsley, basil, salt, and pepper. Bring to a boil; reduce heat and simmer for 30 minutes.
Meanwhile, cook lasagna noodles according to package directions; drain.
In a small bowl, combine ricotta cheese and egg.
Preheat oven to 375°F.

Spread 1 cup meat sauce in an ungreased 9x13 inch baking dish. Layer with three lasagna noodles, 1-1/2 cups meat sauce, 1 cup ricotta mixture, and 1 cup mozzarella cheese. Repeat layers twice. Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.
Cover and bake for 25 minutes. Uncover; bake 25 minutes longer or until bubbly. Let stand for 15 minutes before serving. If desired, sprinkle with additional parsley.

title: Spaghetti with Meatballs
description: A classic Italian dish made with spaghetti and homemade meatballs in tomato sauce.

steps.description: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions, drain and set aside.
In a large bowl, mix ground beef, breadcrumbs, milk, egg, Parmesan cheese, parsley, 1/2 teaspoon salt and 1/4 teaspoon black pepper. Shape into 1-inch meatballs.
In a large skillet over medium heat, cook meatballs until browned on all sides. Remove from skillet and set aside.
In the same skillet, add onion and garlic and cook until softened.
Add tomatoes, sugar, red pepper flakes, salt, and black pepper. Simmer for 10 minutes.
Add meatballs to the tomato sauce and cook for another 10 minutes.
Serve hot over cooked spaghetti.

title: Caesar Salad
description: A classic Caesar Salad recipe made with crisp romaine lettuce, crunchy croutons, and a creamy dressing.

steps.description: In a large bowl, whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, Dijon mustard, garlic, salt, and pepper to make the dressing.
Add chopped romaine lettuce to the bowl and toss to coat with the dressing.
Top with croutons and grated Parmesan cheese.
Serve immediately and enjoy!

title: Homemade Pizza
description: A delicious homemade pizza recipe topped with your favorite toppings.

steps.description: Preheat oven to 425°F.
Roll out the pizza dough on a floured surface until it is the desired thickness and shape.
Transfer the pizza dough to a greased baking sheet or pizza stone.
Spread tomato sauce evenly over the pizza dough, leaving a small border around the edges.
Sprinkle shredded mozzarella cheese over the tomato sauce.
Add your desired toppings to the pizza.
Bake for 12-15 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
Let cool for a few minutes before slicing and serving.

title: Classic Chocolate Cake
description: A classic chocolate cake recipe that is moist, rich, and delicious.

steps.description: Preheat oven to 350°F.
Grease and flour two 9-inch round cake pans.
In a large bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, cocoa powder, baking powder, baking soda, and salt.
Add milk, vegetable oil, eggs, and vanilla extract to the bowl and mix until well combined.
Stir in boiling water until the batter is smooth and well combined.
Divide the batter evenly between the prepared cake pans.
Bake for 30-35 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
Let the cakes cool in the pans for 10 minutes before removing them from the pans and placing them on a wire rack to cool completely.
Frost and decorate the cake as desired and serve.
